meanings.definition: To perform a duet with someone else.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, Sarah and I duetted at the school talent show.
meanings.sent2: The singers duetted beautifully on stage, harmonizing perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The two birds duetted in the tree, creating a lovely melody.
meanings.sent4: The violin and piano duetted together, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The actors duetted in the play, captivating the audience with their performance.

meanings.sent1: The duetted performance was a highlight of the concert.
meanings.sent2: I listened to the duetted song on repeat, enjoying every note.
meanings.sent3: The duetted voices echoed through the hall, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent4: The duetted melody lingered in my mind long after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The duetted piece was a masterpiece, showcasing the talents of both musicians.
